snippet: SIEGEL--Jerome A. The members of The Lotos Club mourn the loss of their distinguished colleague and friend, Jerome Siegel, and send condolences to his family. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SIEGEL--Jerome A. The members of The Lotos Club mourn the loss of their distinguished colleague and friend, Jerome Siegel, and send condolences to his family. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SIEGEL, JEROME A
